name: Trendeo
desc: Data on company capital expenditures over $30mm or 60 jobs created worldwide, available in near real time.
full_ticker_coverage: All industrial investors, listed or not
full_sector_coverage: Capital investment worldwide (energy, manufacturing, R&D, logistics)
sectors: Agriculture, Autos, Cannabis, China, Energy, Industrials
pricing_structure: 14 K€/year opens web access and full export capability on 13000 data since 2016, increasing weekly
why_us?: To track "real" information on companies they cover
advantages: real time trends on various sectors, quantified data
use_cases: market analysis, with sector and geographical aspects
